item.title: Orphaned case, rep++ [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

[quote=“Zosedan, post:11, topic:428457”]switch(npcType) { case 251: //arthur if(c.royal == 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(560, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 1) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(569, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 6) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(598, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 3 || c.royal == 4 || c.royal == 5) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(593, npcType); } else { c.sendMessage("This NPC has nothing to say at the moment"); } break; }[/quote]
Ok that worked, now can you make it work for all these lines bro?

case 251: //arthur if(c.royal == 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(560, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 1) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(569, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 6) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(598, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 3 || c.royal == 4 || c.royal == 5) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(593, npcType); } else { c.sendMessage("This NPC has nothing to say at the moment"); } break; case 245: // lucan if(c.royal == 1) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(570, 302); } else if(c.royal == 2) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(581, 302); } else if(c.royal == 9) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(515, npcType); } else { c.sendMessage("This NPC has nothing to say at the moment"); } break; case 239: //lancelot if(c.royal == 2) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(576, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 3) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(585, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 7) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(510, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 8) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(510, npcType); } else if(c.royal == 9) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(514, npcType); } else { c.sendMessage("This NPC is too busy to speak at the moment"); } break; case 731: //bartender if(c.royal == 5) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(594, npcType); } break;

item.title: Orphaned case, rep++ [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

I fixed this and for anyone who had the same problem all you do is add a “switch(npcType) {” and another bracket after the break;

[code] //royal quest

switch(npcType) {
case 251: //arthur
if(c.royal == 0) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(560, npcType);
} else if(c.royal == 1) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(569, npcType);
} else if(c.royal == 6) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(598, npcType);
} else if(c.royal == 3 || c.royal == 4 || c.royal == 5) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(593, npcType);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This NPC has nothing to say at the moment”);
}
break;
}

switch(npcType) {
case 245: // lucan
if(c.royal == 1) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(570, 302);
} else if(c.royal == 2) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(581, 302);
} else if(c.royal == 9) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(515, npcType);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This NPC has nothing to say at the moment”);
}
break;
}

switch(npcType) {
case 239: //lancelot
if(c.royal == 2) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(576, npcType);
} else if(c.royal == 3) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(585, npcType);
} else if(c.royal == 7) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(510, npcType);
} else if(c.royal == 8) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(510, npcType);
} else if(c.royal == 9) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(514, npcType);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This NPC is too busy to speak at the moment”);
}
break;

}

switch(npcType) {
case 731: //bartender
if(c.royal == 5) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(594, npcType);
}
break;
}
//royal[/code]

Read full topic
